imdb.plot outline: Re-Living The Holocaust: Through Their Eyes is produced by The Flame Society through the cooperation of numerous Holocaust museums and education centers around the US, Israel and the world. The goal is to bring factual information about the Holocaust to the public. The vast majority of testimonies of Holocaust survivors have never been viewed by anyone other than Holocaust historians. It is our goal to bring these amazing testimonies to the public. Re-Living The Holocaust: Through Their Eyes not only concentrates on the testimony of survivors, but also on liberators... the soldiers who liberated the camps in 1945, telling what they saw with their own eyes
imdb.title: Re-living the Holocaust: Through Their Eyes
akas: Re-living the Holocaust: Through Their Eyes (United States)
plot: Re-Living The Holocaust: Through Their Eyes is produced by The Flame Society through the cooperation of numerous Holocaust museums and education centers around the US, Israel and the world. The goal is to bring factual information about the Holocaust to the public. The vast majority of testimonies of Holocaust survivors have never been viewed by anyone other than Holocaust historians. It is our goal to bring these amazing testimonies to the public. Re-Living The Holocaust: Through Their Eyes not only concentrates on the testimony of survivors, but also on liberators... the soldiers who liberated the camps in 1945, telling what they saw with their own eyes::Bob Pianka, executive producer
